problem.markdown:
Which of the following processes can not be executed?
[x] An isentropic and adiabatic process which is irreversible [ ] An isentropic process in which the entropy produced is positive. [ ] An adiabatic process in which the entropy of the system increases [x] An adiabatic process in which the entropy of the system decreases
problem.p: Which of the following processes can not be executed?

checkboxgroup.choice: An isentropic and adiabatic process which is irreversible
An isentropic process in which the entropy produced is positive.
An adiabatic process in which the entropy of the system increases
An adiabatic process in which the entropy of the system decreases
